text: ennaneyan a bahudaivavisvasikalkk allahuvinre atukkalum avanre dutanre atukkalum utampati nilanilkkuka? ninnal arumayi masjidul haraminre atutt vecc kararil erpettuvea avarkkallate. ennal avar ninnaleat sariyayi varttikkunnetattealam ninnal avareatum sariyayi varttikkuka. tirccayayum allahu suksmata palikkunnavare istappetunnu
